# admiralty-input-error



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                                                                                                 |
| ---- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|      | The error content should be placed in the slot e.g. `<admiralty-input-error>This field is required</admiralty-input-error>` |
